subject: Baseball
Little League World Series
lead_paragraph: Bradley Smith struck out seven and went 4 for 4 at the plate, and Petaluma, Calif., held on for a 6-4 victory over Fairfield, Conn., in the Little League World Series.
snippet: Bradley Smith struck out seven and went 4 for 4 at the plate, and Petaluma, Calif., held on for a 6-4 victory over Fairfield, Conn., in the Little League World Series.
